alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:17AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. 1 to 3 inches near the Idaho border through Saturday morning, an additional 3 to 8 inches is expected Saturday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected for routes near the Utah/Idaho border through Saturday morning. More widespread winter driving conditions can be expected Saturday afternoon through Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
